summary: High-Rez retexture for the stone quarries introduced in \"Hearthfire\".
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading]Stone Quarries - Retextured [/heading][/center]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27779-1-1354571988.jpg[/img]

The stone quarry textures from Hearthfire looked really out of place, cartoonish and had visible seams in my game and since I could not find a texture replacement I went ahead and made one myself.

[heading]Description:[/heading]
This mod replaces the low rez (512px) texture and normal of the stone quarries that come with Hearthfire with handpainted/photo 2048px ones that have a more realistic look to them.

Keep in mind that I changed the look of these textures quite a bit to make them look more \"realistic\" and blend with the mountain textures from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4805]AnOldFriendÂ´s AOF Detailed Mountains[/url].

Take a look at the images to see if you like the new look.


[b]Changed textures:[/b]
[list]
[*]stonequarry01
[*]stonequarry01_n
[/list]

[b]Recommended mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4805]AnOldFriend - AOF Detailed Mountains[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123]The Wilds ENB[/url]

Please tell me if something does not work as this is my very first \"mod\" for Skyrim, thanks.
author: Loginius
